body.text:
Good Afternoon,

Can you provide the following statements for product: Matpers HT 982


  *   1,4 Dioxane Free Statement
  *   Nanomaterial Statement
  *   RSPO Statement

Please advise,

Thank you




***Please send all documents as individual PDF files; we cannot accept ZIP files. Expected turnaround times for document requests are listed below.***

Document Type
Turnaround Time (Typical/Business Days)
Specifications, SDS, Kosher, etc.
3-5 Days
Questionnaires/Surveys
20-30 Days
Misc. Statements/Other Documents
TO BE DETERMINED

Grace Diaz
